title: The History of NFTs
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The History of NFTs.

hook.text: NFTs didn't start with million-dollar art. They started with pixelated punks and cartoon cats.

buildup.text: CryptoPunks launched in 2017 as 10,000 free pixel avatars on Ethereum. Nobody paid attention at first.

discovery.text: CryptoKitties followed â€” a game where you bred digital cats. It was so popular it crashed Ethereum.

twist.text: Both projects seemed like toys. Years later, single CryptoPunks sold for over $20 million each.

climax.text: What started as experiments became the blueprint for a multi-billion-dollar market in digital collectibles.

punchline.text: Pixelated punks and cartoon cats built a billion-dollar market.
